name: Gravitant
overview:
Founded in 2004 and based in Austin, Texas, Gravitant is the leader in cloud services brokerage and management for enterprises, SIs and cloud providers. Gravitant is led by a team of software technology experts who successfully commercialized industry-leading B2B Commerce, Marketplaces and SOA platforms with fortune 500 companies including IBM, Commerce One and SAP.

Our mission is simple: We help enterprise IT effectively meet business needs by optimizing cloud consumption for agility, responsiveness, service levels and cost across multiple cloud service providers. Only Gravitant provides a single unified user interface that allows Enterprises to Design, Order, Provision & Control public, private and hybrid cloud services in an end-to-end process that can be dynamically recalibrated at any time.
